Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5992 affecting package opensc for versions less than 0.23.0-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-5992 affecting package opensc for versions less than 0.23.0-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package opensc is earlier than 0.23.0-3, affected by CVE-2023-5992
